pages.text: A block that uses soul to kill mobs
R-click to toggle the range, Shift r-click to change modes

The Soul Sacrificer has 2 modes:$(br)When the range has a darker color, it will kill mobs and drop their loot.$(br)When the range has a lighter color, it will kill mobs and either add their max health as soul in the chunk, or a fraction of their max health as vessel!
